summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2771 for the improvement of Waverly Place, from the north line of Westlake Boulevard Addition to Newton Place; certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing therein sewers of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins, and all other appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district.
